cause.description:
With your help, we can get all of Facebook using Snapvine to connect their social network to their phone network.
Soon, we'll all be able to send and receive voice comments from Facebook.
1. Get Snapvine http://apps.facebook.com/snapvine/
2. Tell your friends to get Snapvine
3. Leave voice comments for everyone
cause.mission: get everyone on Facebook to use Snapvine
cause.name: Spread Snapvine
